name: opnet-build
description: asc bundled with the opnet runtime and a virtual filesystem for building contracts in the browser

scripts.build:scripts: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && node scripts/utils/rename.mjs ./tmp/createRuntimeBundle.js ./tmp/createRuntimeBundle.cjs && node scripts/utils/rename.mjs ./tmp/publishOnChange.js ./tmp/publishOnChange.cjs
scripts.build:runtime: npm i @btc-vision/btc-runtime && npm i @btc-vision/opnet-transform && node ./tmp/createRuntimeBundle.cjs &&  node esbuild-runtime.config.mjs
scripts.build:uglifyworker: uglifyjs dist/webworker-bundle/opnetBuilder.js -o dist/webworker-bundle/opnetBuilder.js && javascript-obfuscator dist/webworker-bundle/opnetBuilder.js --output dist/webworker-bundle/opnetBuilder.js
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:runtime && npm run build:worker
